txt.en: Quickbeam has asked you to quiet the forest north of Derndingle.
Leaf-piles are smothering the undergrowth north of Derndingle
Quickbeam is at Derndingle in south-east Fangorn.
Tend the forest north of Derndingle
Midges have infested the forest north of Derndingle
'When we marched on Isengard, the forest was awoken. It is very angry with the actions of the wizard we trusted. Too angry, I cannot calm it myself.\n\n'Please tend the forest north of Derndingle.'
When the Ents decided to march to war, the forest awoke, angry and betrayed. With Isengard destroyed, Quickbeam is attempting to calm Fangorn and quiet it once more.
